69C0825C42D54237B5275C8A100B7740: Allow players to bring eliminated teammates back into the game.
59C31A224099CFA9C4E60999BDBBA7A9: Allows players to bring eliminated teammates back into the game.
172B164045781D309F4997889E67BAAE: Disable this Reboot Van on receiving a signal from the selected channel.
14F481D04A44B4DF0BFA518EB9FFAFA6: Enable this Reboot Van on receiving a signal from the selected channel.
EBB30EDD40A9472B8055E2874E43767A: Transmits when this Reboot Van has finished rebooting a set of players.
013FB379454BC30BE44B66AB603D1E1C: Transmits when this Reboot Van has finished recharging.

UserOptionDefinition.Device_RebootVan_C.Recharge Time.Descrip: Determines the amount of time that the device must wait after rebooting a player before it can reboot another player.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_RebootVan_C.EnabledOnGameStart.De: Determines whether the Reboot Van is enabled when the game starts.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_RebootVan_C.RebootProgressDecay.D: How quickly reboot progress decays when nobody is interacting with the Reboot Van. CUSTOM DECAY - Set a custom multiplier on the decay rate. INSTANT RESET - Instantly reset progress to zero. BATTLE ROYALE - Use Battle Royale's decay rate.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_RebootVan_C.Invert Class Selectio: If set, this device is usable by all but the selected class.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_RebootVan_C.Invert Team Selection: If set, this device is usable by all but the selected team.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_RebootVan_C.DecayRateMultiplier.D: Multiplier on the decay rate of reboot progress.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_RebootVan_C.Activating Class.Desc: Players of this class are able to use this device.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_RebootVan_C.Activating Team.Descr: Players on this team are able to use this device.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_RebootVan_C.OnRebooted.Descriptio: Triggers when this Reboot Van has finished rebooting a set of players.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_RebootVan_C.OnRecharged.Descripti: Triggers when this Reboot Van has finished recharging.
